facts: Aron is standing on the Canyon Floor
Aron is an American mountaineer and mechanical engineer
Aron sees a pile of steel filings from a knife
The pile of filings is almost as big as the dust from the ground
comm_style: Aron is likes to touch objects, feel them with his hands
Aron says very little, and what he says is usually what's 'at the tip of his tongue' - not well thought through pieces of his thoughts
goals: Aron inspects the pile of steel filings
